summary: The author is a professor of pathology at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio. He is the author of a book called Genetically Enhanced Casdivesca (GECC) The book is written in the form of two pages sete most pene pubhentens 00 NOT Bxcees to Paes. The author has also written books on cancer research.
